title: Sidewall, "Thistle", 1940–45
creditline: Gift of A.L. Diament and Co.
description: Small rows of thistles; interspersed are tiny leaves suggestive of maiden-hair fern. A reproduction of an early American wallpaper of 1845-1855. Found on walls of old house in South Carolina. Printed in blue, dark and medium brown on light tan field.
